text:
e="preserve">Álvaro de Lapuerta Quintero (22 September 1927 – 2 June 2018) was a Spanish politician. He was born in Madrid. He sat on the Congress of Deputies between 1977 and 2004, and as served as treasurer of the People's Party from 1993 to 2008.
Lapuerta died on 2 June 2018 in Madrid of complications of dementia at the age of 90.
